page.title: 10EDUCATION,KIRKCALDY-KINGHORN
page.content: Pupils from the lower part of Kirkcaldy attend the{West Primary {School}in Kirkcaldy, and those from Kinghorn attend{Kinghorn Primary. For their secondary education pupils from both areas attend{Balwearie High {School,}a six year comprehensive school in Kirkcaldy and one of the six secondary scools in Fife to contain a Department of Special Education catering for pupils with learning difficulties. Since the catchment area for this school is fairly wide it follows that many pupils are bussed to school each day. All three schools above are local authority schools administered by Fife Regional Council.
